title: Hilary Clinton is diagnosed with fascist dementia. Is it one year to live?
subtitle: The viral video uses false and false evidence in an attempt to prove that Hillary Clinton suffers from sub-cortical dementia and has only one year to live.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The leaked medical records, combined with viral images and videos, show that Hillary Clinton suffers from sub-cortical dementia and has only one year to live.
